sentences.sContent: She’s two years older than me.
That’s me, standing on the left.
sentences.sCn: 那是我，站在左边的那一个。

sentences.sContent: ...but will the shuttle get me to the airport in time...
...if you want to try to shut me down...
...Please contact me by telephone before visit...
...Will you please let me know when it's leaving...
...The one that used to get me was that swans could break your leg when they blow of the wing...
...you could also visit me at my dorm: 101Room at Dorm 1...
...It seems to me that a compromise would be receiving the exam questions a day or two in advance...
...I think it has been even more fun keeping the secret for me the past few weeks...
...the situation has given my college son and me something to share...

synos.tran: 自我；极端自私的人；自我的一部分

trans.tranOther: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself
